Problems 1-2 concern the following proposition from Ch 6 of your textbook. 

**Proposition:** If $Z \sim N(0,1)$ and $U \sim \chi^2_{n}$ are independent, then 
$$T = \frac{Z}{\sqrt{U/n}} \sim t_{(n)}.$$ 


#### Problem 1 (6.1)
If $Z \sim N(0,1)$ and $U \sim \chi^2_{n}$, what is the density of $W = \sqrt{\frac{U}{n}}$?
